description.en:
Unia Farma Silo Bulk Pack Adds variants of the Unia Farma silo's that support bulk products. This greatly expands what can be stored in them. The silo's are otherwise unmodified from the base game.
This allows things like silage, lime, and hay to be stored in these silos.
Farma 100 Bulk - Category: Placeables - Buildings - Silo Extensions - Price: $52,000 - Daily Upkeep: $20 - Capacity: 100,000 L
Farma 150 Bulk - Category: Placeables - Buildings - Silo Extensions - Price: $56,000 - Daily Upkeep: $25 - Capacity: 150,000 L
Farma 200 Bulk - Category: Placeables - Buildings - Silo Extensions - Price: $60,000 - Daily Upkeep: $30 - Capacity: 200,000 L
Farma 250 Bulk - Category: Placeables - Buildings - Silo Extensions - Price: $64,000 - Daily Upkeep: $35 - Capacity: 250,000 L
Farma 400 + Obi 1000 Bulk - Category: Placeables - Buildings - Silos - Price: $117,000 - Daily Upkeep: $120 - Capacity: 400,000 L
Farma 500 + Obi 1000 Bulk - Category: Placeables - Buildings - Silos - Price: $125,000 - Daily Upkeep: $140 - Capacity: 500,000 L
Farma 800 + Obi 1000 Bulk - Category: Placeables - Buildings - Silos - Price: $147,000 - Daily Upkeep: $150 - Capacity: 800,000 L

description.de:

Dadurch können Dinge wie Silage, Kalk und Heu in diesen Silos gelagert werden.
